Author: cipi#4502
Content:
i also had the problem of "SWAP never started" couple of times... bob then shows
```didnt get valid data after 120
error waitsend pubkeys```
the reason was always the same: i forgot to stop my JDownloader on alice before starting the swap
with a running download in the background on alice, 90% of the swap attempts failed

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: I dont have time to troubleshoot it. it sounds like a reclaim is needed, which would happen after bob side does his reclaiming. BTC txfees went steeply up the other day and is the likely cause. with BTC the timeouts are set long, so as long as bob is still running his node, you can reclaim a bit faster. if he isnt then it invokes a different claim, but for that you need to wait a bit longer. you do get 12.5% more though

Content: cipi would know best how to recover
